column5: Anyone know of any tackle shops in the belle river area where i can get a few muskie baits.
I would try deerbrook marina there is a tackle store in Belle River on the north side of the main street as well, kinda smelly though, rotten bait and cigarettes, what a combo!
so i can get some baits at the marina

yeah, but just like the casino only take what you are willing to lose errr spend lol  He's got a good collection of St. Clair Hounds, Wileys, not sure if they have woodies there or not, I know the other store does...
